name: The Quacken (Reeds)
description:
..an N64 style eat-em-up

Release the Quacken!

Start as a weak but hungry "duck", and consume the souls of the lakegoers to buy upgrades. Complete challenges and unlock items! 

This is my entry into mini-jam 64: Nintendo 64. The game was created solo within 72 hours. As always , let me know if you run into any issues.

Known Issues (In the OG upload)

It seems there is a "Straw Hat" bug that can occur when launching the game for the first time. It prevents the player from eating or dying, and auto equips the "Authorized Personnel Only" hat. Backing out to menu seems to fix it. 

There is a fix in the "Patched" versions (which was the only thing changed).

Controls

WASD to move, space to attack, left Alt for back. Mouse can be used to navigate the shop. 

C clears all save data

(I know the A and B buttons have the wrong colors, I just like the Gamecube ones better lol) 

This game is inspired by some shark "simulator" that was on the IOS store around 2012
